creator: 陆国际 LU International
descriptionHtml:
【Lu-Global – All About Us】

Lu-Global is the online wealth management platform operated by Lu International (Singapore) Financial Asset Exchange Pte. Ltd.

Lu International (Singapore) Financial Asset Exchange Pte. Ltd. (Co. Reg. No. 201702479G) (“Lu International”), an affiliate of the Ping An Group, as well as a related entity of Shanghai Lujiazui International Financial Asset Exchange Co., Ltd. (“Lufax”), which operates China’s leading online wealth management platform LU.COM.

Lu International, which operates the LU-GLOBAL platform, is Ping An Group's first foray out of China. The LU-GLOBAL mobile investment and wealth management platform is operated out of Singapore and offers 24/7 online access to a wide range of high quality investment products.

Lu International was incorporated in Singapore in January 2017 and holds a capital markets services licence from the Monetary Authority of Singapore (“MAS”) for dealing in securities, fund management, providing custodial services for securities and is an exempt financial adviser.

Lu International is able to leverage and tap on the expertise and experience accumulated by Ping An Group and Lufax, both market leaders, in the field of internet financial and wealth technology to provide key innovations to the LU-GLOBAL platform. Operating in a sound risk-management environment, the LU-GLOBAL platform is able to provide both savvy as well as new investors with the security, convenience, efficiency and professionalism expected of a global online wealth management service.

【Lu-Global – Top 3 Pros】

1) Secure and Reliable Global Investment Platform

- Pursuant to the requirements set out by MAS, Lu-Global’s account opening and transactional processes are fully compliant with Singapore regulatory requirements, and Lu International continuously strives to create a secure and reliable investment platform for its customers

- Lu International currently banks with the largest local bank in Singapore, DBS Bank Limited. Customers’ funds custodised on the Lu-Global platform would be safely custodised by DBS Bank Limited.

2) Leading Global Online Investment Experience

- Tapping on Ping An Group’s years of experience in the internet financial investment arena, as well as the depth and breadth of the Group’s understanding of customer investment behavior, Lu International is able to develop and deliver a holistic, efficient and more convenient investment experience

- Being fully digital and with a user-friendly interface, the Lu-Global application is easy to use for both amateurs exploring the new world of investments as well as savvy investors who appreciate the freedom of self-directed wealth management

3) Global Investment Opportunities

- Extensive selection of global funds sourced from internationally renowned institutions provides quality assets worldwide to allow investors to participate in global market growth opportunities

- Lu-Global’s suite of products have varying minimum investment requirements, with the smallest minimum investment amount being a mere US$1. We cater to investors from all walks of life and we are here to show that investments can start small and at any time. We believe that everyone is entitled to seek out and enjoy global investment opportunities.



【Lu-Global – How to seek help?】

If you have any queries or require any assistance or support, please contact us at either 400-169-8800 or +65 6727 8666 from Mondays to Fridays, 9.00 AM to 6.00 PM SGT (where it is not a public holiday in Singapore). We are always happy to be of help.



【Lu-Global – Additional Information】

The images provided are for display purposes only and may not accurately depict the actual use of the Lu-Global application and are not representative of the actual process.
descriptionShort: Reliable online wealth management with your one-stop global investment platform.

1. Welcome vouchers worth up to 1666 USD for new registered customers.

2. Spin the wheel online and get chances to win exclusive gifts in May. Available for a limited time only.

Lu-Global is the online wealth management platform operated by Lu International (Singapore) Financial Asset Exchange Pte. Ltd.

Lu International (Singapore) Financial Asset Exchange Pte. Ltd. (Co. Reg. No. 201702479G) (“Lu International”), an affiliate of the Ping An Group, as well as a related entity of Shanghai Lujiazui International Financial Asset Exchange Co., Ltd. (“Lufax”), which operates China’s leading online wealth management platform LU.COM.

Lu International, which operates the LU-GLOBAL platform, is Ping An Group's first foray out of China. The LU-GLOBAL mobile investment and wealth management platform is operated out of Singapore and offers 24/7 online access to a wide range of high quality investment products.

Lu International was incorporated in Singapore in January 2017 and holds a capital markets services licence from the Monetary Authority of Singapore (“MAS”) for dealing in securities, fund management, providing custodial services for securities and is an exempt financial adviser.

Lu International is able to leverage and tap on the expertise and experience accumulated by Ping An Group and Lufax, both market leaders, in the field of internet financial and wealth technology to provide key innovations to the LU-GLOBAL platform. Operating in a sound risk-management environment, the LU-GLOBAL platform is able to provide both savvy as well as new investors with the security, convenience, efficiency and professionalism expected of a global online wealth management service.

【Lu-Global – Top 3 Pros】

1) Secure and Reliable Global Investment Platform

- Pursuant to the requirements set out by MAS, Lu-Global’s account opening and transactional processes are fully compliant with Singapore regulatory requirements, and Lu International continuously strives to create a secure and reliable investment platform for its customers

- Lu International currently banks with the largest local bank in Singapore, DBS Bank Limited. Customers’ funds custodised on the Lu-Global platform would be safely custodised by DBS Bank Limited.

2) Leading Global Online Investment Experience

- Tapping on Ping An Group’s years of experience in the internet financial investment arena, as well as the depth and breadth of the Group’s understanding of customer investment behavior, Lu International is able to develop and deliver a holistic, efficient and more convenient investment experience

- Being fully digital and with a user-friendly interface, the Lu-Global application is easy to use for both amateurs exploring the new world of investments as well as savvy investors who appreciate the freedom of self-directed wealth management

3) Global Investment Opportunities

- Extensive selection of global funds sourced from internationally renowned institutions provides quality assets worldwide to allow investors to participate in global market growth opportunities

- Lu-Global’s suite of products have varying minimum investment requirements, with the smallest minimum investment amount being a mere US$1. We cater to investors from all walks of life and we are here to show that investments can start small and at any time. We believe that everyone is entitled to seek out and enjoy global investment opportunities.



【Lu-Global – How to seek help?】

If you have any queries or require any assistance or support, please contact us at either 400-169-8800 or +65 6727 8666 from Mondays to Fridays, 9.00 AM to 6.00 PM SGT (where it is not a public holiday in Singapore). We are always happy to be of help.



【Lu-Global – Additional Information】

The images provided are for display purposes only and may not accurately depict the actual use of the Lu-Global application and are not representative of the actual process.
descriptionShort: Reliable online wealth management with your one-stop global investment platform.

title: Lu-Global

creator: 陆国际 LU International
descriptionHtml:
【Lu-Global – All About Us】

Lu-Global is the online wealth management platform operated by Lu International (Singapore) Financial Asset Exchange Pte. Ltd.

Lu International (Singapore) Financial Asset Exchange Pte. Ltd. (Co. Reg. No. 201702479G) (“Lu International”), an affiliate of the Ping An Group, as well as a related entity of Shanghai Lujiazui International Financial Asset Exchange Co., Ltd. (“Lufax”), which operates China’s leading online wealth management platform LU.COM.

Lu International, which operates the LU-GLOBAL platform, is Ping An Group's first foray out of China. The LU-GLOBAL mobile investment and wealth management platform is operated out of Singapore and offers 24/7 online access to a wide range of high quality investment products.

Lu International was incorporated in Singapore in January 2017 and holds a capital markets services licence from the Monetary Authority of Singapore (“MAS”) for dealing in securities, fund management, providing custodial services for securities and is an exempt financial adviser.

Lu International is able to leverage and tap on the expertise and experience accumulated by Ping An Group and Lufax, both market leaders, in the field of internet financial and wealth technology to provide key innovations to the LU-GLOBAL platform. Operating in a sound risk-management environment, the LU-GLOBAL platform is able to provide both savvy as well as new investors with the security, convenience, efficiency and professionalism expected of a global online wealth management service.

【Lu-Global – Top 3 Pros】

1) Secure and Reliable Global Investment Platform

- Pursuant to the requirements set out by MAS, Lu-Global’s account opening and transactional processes are fully compliant with Singapore regulatory requirements, and Lu International continuously strives to create a secure and reliable investment platform for its customers

- Lu International currently banks with the largest local bank in Singapore, DBS Bank Limited. Customers’ funds custodised on the Lu-Global platform would be safely custodised by DBS Bank Limited.

2) Leading Global Online Investment Experience

- Tapping on Ping An Group’s years of experience in the internet financial investment arena, as well as the depth and breadth of the Group’s understanding of customer investment behavior, Lu International is able to develop and deliver a holistic, efficient and more convenient investment experience

- Being fully digital and with a user-friendly interface, the Lu-Global application is easy to use for both amateurs exploring the new world of investments as well as savvy investors who appreciate the freedom of self-directed wealth management

3) Global Investment Opportunities

- Extensive selection of global funds sourced from internationally renowned institutions provides quality assets worldwide to allow investors to participate in global market growth opportunities

- Lu-Global’s suite of products have varying minimum investment requirements, with the smallest minimum investment amount being a mere US$1. We cater to investors from all walks of life and we are here to show that investments can start small and at any time. We believe that everyone is entitled to seek out and enjoy global investment opportunities.

If you have any queries or require any assistance or support, please contact us at either 400-169-8800 or +65 6727 8666 from Mondays to Fridays, 9.00 AM to 6.00 PM SGT (where it is not a public holiday in Singapore). We are always happy to be of help.
